name: Henk de Tooster
description:
This game is made to educate people on how to fix a toaster, after finishing the game, players will be able to fix any toaster in their real life environment.

This game was made during a gamejam, hosted by the minor GD3D in Leeuwarden, the students working on this were: Hendrik Provilij, Tineke Broeksma, Annefleur Reynhout & Brent Vos.
